item.title: Trump says H-1B visa program is 'great' amid MAGA feud over tech workers
item.description: Trump allies, including Elon Musk, vigorously defended the program to other MAGA adherents this week.

item.title: Why tech giants such as Microsoft, Amazon, Google and Meta are betting big on nuclear power
item.description: Tech's biggest companies are turning to nuclear power for their efficiency and sustainability goals and to meet massive energy demands.

item.title: Janet Yellen says Treasury Department will need to take 'extraordinary measures' to avoid debt ceiling next month
item.description: Yellen's notification is the clearest sign yet that the fight to avoid default will likely take place in the early months of the new Trump administrat...

item.title: Elon Musk accused of censoring conservatives on X who disagree with him about immigration
item.description: The claims came after Elon Musk was involved in a public feud with some Republicans over immigration.

item.title: FDA says the Zepbound shortage is over. Hereâ€™s what that means for compounding pharmacies, patients who used off-brand versions
item.description: The decision will largely prevent compounding pharmacies from making and selling compounded versions of the drug in the next two to three months.
